title: RSV vaccine to protect infants gets green light from FDA advisors
description: Faint data signal of possible increased risk of premature birth caused some concern.

title: These tiny jumping spiders walk like ants to evade predators
description: "Its gait and trajectory show high similarity with multiple ant species.”

title: Google pushes .zip and .mov domains onto the Internet, and the Internet pushes back
description: Will new TLDs undo decades of work to stop malicious links?

title: FCC rejects Dish 5G plan that could have made Starlink broadband “unusable”
description: Satellite broadband would be harmed by mobile service in 12 GHz band, FCC rules.

title: Raspberry Pi CEO: Supply should be “unconstrained” in second half of 2023
description: Following "lousy first quarter," Upton expects "hundreds of thousands" by Q3.

title: SCOTUS spares Section 230, rules Google, Twitter not liable for aiding ISIS
description: Supreme Court rulings leave Section 230 reforms to Congress.

title: iOS 16.5 and macOS 13.4 bring sports news, Bluetooth fixes, and security updates
description: Per usual, Apple is expected to announce the next versions of these OSes at WWDC.

title: YouTube TV shows repeating Little Mermaid ad instead of end of NBA playoff game
description: Frustrating glitch has some worried about streaming NFL games.

title: Telcos detail plan to charge Big Tech firms for access to Internet users
description: Telco lobby makes network-fee pitch to EU, seeks payment for "traffic delivery."

title: AI in your pocket: ChatGPT officially comes to iPhone with new app
description: App brings popular AI assistant to an official native mobile app for the first time.

title: The Pixel 8 Pro’s mystery sensor is… a temperature sensor?
description: Leaked video shows swiping the phone across your head to measure body temperature.

title: Microsoft hints at letting players watch ads for “timed slices of games”
description: Exec says they're "experimenting" with models beyond Game Pass subscriptions.

title: It’s a Raspberry Pi, a BlackBerry keyboard, and a battery: It’s the Beepberry
description: "Don't expect something perfect," Pebble founder tells potential buyers.

title: Montana is first state to ban TikTok over national security concerns
description: TikTok vows to fight Montana ban.

title: Truckers are caught on the front lines of California’s EV push
description: By 2024, trucks bought for use in the state’s ports and rail yards must be zero-emission.

title: Nvidia introduces $399 RTX 4060 Ti and $299 4060 without introducing a price hike
description: 8GB 4060 Ti launches May 24; $499 16GB version and $299 4060 follow in July.

title: We’re effectively alone in the Universe, and that’s OK
description: Solitude is not a curse—it urges us to explore the mysteries of our galaxy and beyond.
